snippet.title: The Heirloom — Kickstarter Launch Teaser
snippet.description:
🍪 The Heirloom is OUT NOW on Kickstarter!!! 🍪

Uncover the secrets of your family and your grandfather’s old lighthouse as you seek the truth behind the unusual happenings in "The Heirloom", a mysterious thriller adventure game inspired by the atmosphere of the Hebrides and Scottish folklore!

✨ Support it now! https://bit.ly/The-Heirloom-KS


#videogame #indiegame #kickstarter #adventuregame #cozygame #videogames #indiegames #adventuregames #gaming #ps5 #pcgame #nintendoswitch #xbox
